title: Chained (feat. Cameron Neal)
lyrics:
We can runaway
But we can't hide for long
And all that lingers harms us
I can lie to you
But the truth comes alive
Every time I die

Saying goodbye



'Cause I don't want to change

And I can't stay this way

And I don't even mind staying chained

And thinking of you

Thinking of you



Is it up to me?

It's always been up to you

To find the peace we needed to

Is it said and done

Is it carved in the stone

And how many days is it gonna take

'Til we get back home



'Cause I don't want to change

And I can't stay this way

And I don't even mind staying chained

And thinking of you

Thinking of you



Will you wake me up

Will you shake me up

'Cause I'm losing my way in the game

Even at our best, my love

Neither one of us was every be good enough



And I don't know why I can't change

And I will always stay this way

And I don't even mind staying chained

And thinking of you

Thinking of you
